name: In re Nomination Petition of Viveca E. GRESHAM for the Office of State Committee Member, District 504, Democratic Party of Pennsylvania. Objection of Sherrie J. Cohen. Appeal of Sherrie J. Cohen
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Gresham

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE (C.J.), SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Viveca E. GRESHAM for the Office of State Committee Member, District 504, Democratic Party of Pennsylvania. Objection of Sherrie J. Cohen. Appeal of Sherrie J. Cohen.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of April, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert E. Paul, Paul, Reich & Myers, P.C., for Sherrie J. Cohen.
Viveca E. Gresham, for Viveca E. Gresham.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation.
Frederick L. Voigt, Philadelphia City Commissioner, for City Commissioners of Philadelphia.
casebody.head_matter:
992 A.2d 112
In re Nomination Petition of Viveca E. GRESHAM for the Office of State Committee Member, District 504, Democratic Party of Pennsylvania. Objection of Sherrie J. Cohen. Appeal of Sherrie J. Cohen.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 12, 2010.
Decided April 26, 2010.
Robert E. Paul, Paul, Reich & Myers, P.C., for Sherrie J. Cohen.
Viveca E. Gresham, for Viveca E. Gresham.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation.
Frederick L. Voigt, Philadelphia City Commissioner, for City Commissioners of Philadelphia.
BEFORE: CASTILLE (C.J.), SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
